attributes.action: Allow vaccinated people to travel in & out of the UK without testing.
attributes.additional_details: Want Parliament to debate the travel industry restrictions including allowing vaccinated people to travel in & out of our country without testing like Greece & other countries have done & ask the PM to look into this as well as force the private companies to lower the costs of the PCR tests to £30 per test to make travel more affordable.
attributes.background: To look at what Greece & other countries are doing regarding travel into & out of their countries & adopt the same methods, which is to put more faith into the vaccines & allow people to travel in & out of the country if they are vaccinated without testing. If not lower the costs to £30 per test.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586189
